participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Determined and fashion-conscious, Samantha loves to express herself through her style and has a strong desire to succeed despite her family's lack of support.
participant_1.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Omar
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and hardworking, Omar enjoys a connection with nature and finds joy in his responsibilities on the farm, as well as the thrill of riding horses.
participant_2.background: i have three arabian horses. i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.
